data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kaczmarek, Łukasz, Gołdyn, Bartłomiej, Prokop, Zofia M., Michalczyk, Łukasz (2011): New records of Tardigrada from Bulgaria with the description of Macrobiotus binieki sp. nov. (Eutardigrada: Macrobiotidae) and a key to the species of the harmsworthi group. Zootaxa 2781: 29-39, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.206999
